entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:14 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
